references.reason: This paper provides the foundational theory of inverse M-matrices, which is central to the proposed inverse M-kernel.
This paper introduces the QNM model, a key competitor to the proposed method, facilitating a direct comparison of performance.

references.paper_title: Learning with Kernels: Support Vector Machines, Regularization, Optimization, and Beyond
references.reason: This book provides a comprehensive overview of kernel methods, which forms the foundation for the techniques discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: Poisson intensity estimation with reproducing kernels
references.reason: This paper addresses a related problem of intensity estimation with non-negativity constraints, demonstrating the practical application of the theoretical concepts.
This book provides the background on Bayesian methods and Gaussian processes which are relevant to the density estimation and intensity estimation tasks.
